      Senior DevOps Engineer, Istio service mesh

      Senior DevOps Engineer, Istio service mesh

      Computer Staff Houston, TX
      3 days ago 133 applicants

      Computer Staff provided pay range

      This range is provided by Computer Staff. Your actual pay will be based on your skills and experience — talk with your recruiter to learn more.

      Base pay range

      $85.00/hr - $100.00/hr

      Direct message the job poster from Computer Staff

      Larry Bergstrom

      Larry Bergstrom

      Who do you need? We have laser focus on mobile, web, software, database, cloud development, Azure devops or AWS devops, CI/CD, QA, test automation;…

      We have been retained by our client in downtown Houston to deliver a Senior DevOps Engineer to join their advanced and large DevOps team on a contract / consulting basis. The DevOps team and Dev team work onsite downtown Houston, and we seek a consultant who enjoys team work onsite. Dev Ops team is releasing new .NET applications that use JS frameworks, Entity Framework, distributed messaging systems, message queues. This is an immediate need for the right candidate to join the DevOps team rolling up, packaging apps and CI CD design, build and deploy. We need a star player experienced with serious Kubernetes (K8s) skills, clusters, and the Kubernetes API. Define and add Istio ServiceMesh to the applications for observability, traffic management and security. Improve load balancing, service to service authentication, failure recovery, metrics and monitoring of deployments, rate limiting, access control, encryption and end-to-end authentication. Deployments with Kubernetes, apps deployed in clusters to match your what service mesh says, to extend service mesh to other clusters, connect VMs, and connect endpoints outside of K8S - all within what the service mesh says or grants or restricts. Use the API Gateway pattern as the front door to microservices, decoupling clients, adding security. Use Azure API management to solve your API Gateway needs, API discovery, API lifecyle, API analytics. Design, build and deploy apps with Azure DevOps CI/CD Pipelines, and this one is Azure DevOps “On-Prem”.


      We expect a level of technical support ability, as well as the ability to communicate and articulate technical problems in a “non-technical” way so the business can understand and sometimes help. Clearly communicate concepts with technical and business users about technical problems and solutions.


      The focus is on candidates for this role that skills include IT automation with any number of tools, K8s, others and implementation and support of Service Mesh (i.e. any of these: Istio, ingress controller, Linkerd or AWS App Mesh) and API Gateways (i.e. any of these: Kong, Envoy, Azure Application Gateway, Azure API Management [APIM], AWS API Gateway), or reverse proxy server. Create and maintain CI/CD pipelines. Develop and maintain application environment automation scripts. Design and implement frameworks and tools that will streamline software development and deployment. Design and implement source code management practices including branching and merging and code quality strategies. Take on a technical leadership role sometimes.



      Experience required:


      4+ years of cumulative Kubernetes (K8s) work experience. Some on-prem K8S experience is desirable. We require some service mesh skills (see above), and we require API gateway skills (see above). Candidate will have experience designing, building, packaging and deploying apps in CI CD pipelines into production. We like experience with any IT automation tools such as: PowerShell, Chef, Ruby, Puppet, or Ansible for configuration. Any scripting of shell and bash scripts. We like experience with package management tools such as PIP, Conda, Maven, NPM, node package manager, or Helm charts with K8S, npm-helm. Some leadership experience or leadership potential is required, from a technical leadership perspective, not people management.



      Employment type: Contract, a least 6 months, renewable, contract to hire is an option, but not required.



      Pay Rate: $85.00 – 100.00 per hour w-2


      Location: Houston, Texas - (Central Houston) - onsite downtown Houston



      Immigration: US citizens and those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply. We are unable to sponsor or transfer H1b candidates at this time.




      Please apply with resume.


      Houston contract opp’ty: Senior DevOps Engineer, Istio service mesh

      http://www.computerstaff.com/?jobIdDescription=739

      Please send a text with your name to set up a phone call:

      817-424-1411
